short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify a scanned sample name in Clarity LIMS for Buffy Coat samples

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides audiovisual feedback if two columns in Clarity LIMS sample table match. Matches will turn green, and non-matches will turn pink. An optional error sound can be enabled to help with error notification during non-visual tasks. This extension does not have any use outside of this specific context.
